summary: The story of the friendship between a star pitcher, wise to the world, and a half-wit catcher, as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.
cast: Michael Moriarty|Robert De Niro|Vincent Gardenia|Phil Foster|Ann Wedgeworth|Patrick McVey|Heather MacRae|Selma Diamond|Barbara Babcock|Maurice Rosenfield|Tom Ligon|Andy Jarrell|Marshall Efron|Donny Burks|Hector Elias|Tom Signorelli|James Donahue|Nicolas Surovy|Danny Aiello|Hector Troy|Tony Major|Barton Heyman|Jack Hollander|Lou Girolami|Ernesto Gonzalez|Alan Manson|Arnold Kapnick|Jean David|Beatrice Manley|Herb Henry|Pierrino Mascarino|Dorothy Neubert|Kaydette Grant|Dell Bethel|Vince Camuto|Jeff Sartorius|Willie Lemmey|Doug Major|Forrest Wynne|James Mahoney|Chip Toland|Frederic C. Weiler
director: Director: John D. Hancock (as John Hancock)
title: Muerte de un jugador
